meanings.definition: A person who grows and sells flowers and ornamental plants.
meanings.sent1: The floriculturists at the market had a wide variety of colorful flowers for sale.
meanings.sent2: Many floriculturists enjoy spending time in their gardens, tending to their plants.
meanings.sent3: The floriculturists decided to have a flower-themed party to celebrate their successful harvest.
meanings.sent4: Her backyard looked like a magical garden, thanks to the talented floriculturists in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The floriculturists' greenhouse was a vibrant paradise of blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: The practice of cultivating and selling flowers and ornamental plants.
meanings.sent1: Floriculturists play a crucial role in bringing beauty to our surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The art of floriculturists involves a deep understanding of different plant species.
meanings.sent3: The floriculturists' market stall was always the most colorful and fragrant.
meanings.sent4: In a world without floriculturists, our gardens would be dull and lifeless.
meanings.sent5: The floriculturists' dedication to their craft was evident in the stunning floral arrangements they created.
